title: Log In Screen on the new client
body:
I updated to the new client when the update came out and i haven't been able to log into my account. I launch the program and then the log in screen pops up but is blank and it just stays that ways for hours... i haven' been able to fix it with the hextech repair tool or anything... 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: You might see a blank login screen if your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our servers. Since the client needs to basically ask our servers what splash screen to display, if it can't grab that info it won't show anything. Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to smooth out any bumps in that connection.
